ing.item: Brussels sprouts; small, firm,bright green, rinsed w/ stem ends and discolored leaves removed

directions.step:
Bring sprouts, 1/2 cup water, and salt to boil in 2-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Lower heat, cover, and simmer (shaking pan once or twice to redistribute sprouts) until knife tip inserted into a brussels sprout
center meets no resistance, 8 to 10 minutes. Drain well and serve.
Cook's Illustrated, Nov./Dec. 1995, Page 21. Credit: Phyllis M. Carey.
